subject: Horse Racing
Preakness Stakes
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Barbaro's champion quality may be vital to his recovery as his shattered right ankle — put back together with 27 screws — heals and he copes with being stall-bound for many months.
snippet: Barbaro's champion quality may be vital to his recovery as his shattered right ankle — put back together with 27 screws — heals and he copes with being stall-bound for many months.
